variant.question:
Pilot fitness to fly includes periodic medical examination by aviation medical specialists. Included in those examinations are assessments of the pilot's sensory system. In addition to sight and sound, which of the following are basic human senses?

1\. Intuition   
 2\. Thermoreception   
 3\. Touch   
 4\. Proprioception   
 5\. Smell   
 6\. Sixth sense   
 7\. Taste
